game.MenuScreens

Class GameOverMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.MenuScreens.GameOverMenu

  • public class GameOverMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Game Over menu, does not create a Screen, but just an overlay on top of MainGame screen.
